scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run dev && npm run publish:master && npm run publish:showcase
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run dev && npm run publish:master && npm run publish:showcase
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run dev && npm run publish:master && npm run publish:showcase
